t: CPSC Warns Consumers to Immediately Stop Using Certain Chinese-Made Faucets Sold on Amazon.com Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Infants, Young Children and Pregnant Women | CPSC.gov
s: CPSC remains focused on the biggest threat to American consumers: hazardous goods from China.”  · The faucets were sold online at Amazon.com for between $30 and $70. Many of these faucets lack branding or other source-identifying labels, and lack safety certifications.
